localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: A bot who helps to monitor Elon's twitter and notify you instantly via Discord app. You no longer have to keep refreshing on his twitter, or mess up your twitter notifications to just follow him.
blogPost.body: A bot who helps to monitor Elon's twitter and notify you instantly via Discord app. You no longer have to keep refreshing on his twitter, or mess up your twitter notifications to just follow him.
blogPost.title: Trade on Elon Tweets - Never missed any tweet, go buying before everyone knows.
blogPost.author: Tony Phung

localize.description: 一个帮助监控Elon的twitter并通过Discord应用即时通知你的机器人。你再也不用不停地刷新他的微博，也不用为了关注他而搞乱你的微博通知了。
localize.tagline: 从来没有错过任何一条微博，趁大家还没知道，赶紧去买吧。

localize.description: 一個幫助監控Elon的twitter並通過Discord應用即時通知你的機器人。你再也不用不停地刷新他的微博，也不用爲了關注他而搞亂你的微博通知了。
localize.tagline: 從來沒有錯過任何一條微博，趁大家還沒知道，趕緊去買吧。

previous.title: 30-Year Mortgage Rate in the US moves up to 3.09%, highest since last June and 44 bps above its all-time low of 2.65% in early January. https://t.co/0Pss5gO06z

localize.full_text: 美国30年期抵押贷款利率升至3.09%，为去年6月以来最高，比1月初的历史低点2.65%高出44个基点。https://t.co/0Pss5gO06z。
美國30年期抵押貸款利率升至3.09%，爲去年6月以來最高，比1月初的歷史低點2.65%高出44個基點。https://t.co/0Pss5gO06z。
